TopicTitle: B9 and deadly reentry, is it a thing?

Articles.Content: I've been a B9 user for a while now, and I want to start a new career mode game. Does anyone know if the space plane fuselages in B9 are shielded in deadly reentry? If not, how hard is it to hack the cfg to make it so?

all I know it needs for deadly re-entry to work is the right heat resistance.

don't hold me to this, I don't use it.

B9 works with DRE.

I have both and use bother.

B9 does not have the ablative shielding but most of the parts that matter have decent heat ratings.
Is There is a conflict when you have DRE and FAR ?
B9, DRE, and FAR all work fine together.

B9 does not have the ablative shielding but most of the parts that matter have decent heat ratings.

DRE comes with ModuleManager configuration file, which modifies maximum temperatures and also adds ModuleHeatShield to every fuselage part.

Edited February 19, 2014 by Magion
